title: Multiple Error Types
description: In this lab, we see an example where an Option needs to interact with a Result, or a Result<T, Error1> needs to interact with a Result<T, Error2>.

meta.title: Mastering Multiple Error Types in Rust
meta.description: Explore strategies for handling different error types in Rust, including interacting an Option with a Result or a Result
